INKCAZELO:

Isiqinisekiso sokulungela indlela kwesithuthi singafumaneka kuso nasiphi na isikhululo sokuvavanywa kwezithuthi sabucala okanye saseburhulumenteni.

Uvavanyo lokulungela indlela lujongana nale miba kwizithuthi:

* umnini-sithuthi neempepha zoko
* izixhobo zombane
* izinto ezidingwayo sisithuthi kunye nezixhobo (eziquka izipili, amabhanti okhuseleko, njalo-njalo)
* iziqhoboshi
* amavili (kuquka nemeko yamatayala)
* ukuqina nobunzima
* ivili lokuqhuba
* injini
* isikhupha-moya omdaka
* ukujika-jika nokuqhuba, izixhobo
* amahla-ndinyuka esithuthi
Iphetshana lovavanyo olupheleleyo lokulungela indlela kwesithuthi liyafumaneka kwiPhepha-ndaba likaRhulumentelomhla wama-23 wenyanga yeNkanga apha ku-2005 (onombolo ingu-28227).
